nodes.excerpt: Flalingo is an online English learning portal where you can study English online from anywhere in the world. If you want to improve your English speaking skills systematically, Flalingo is for you.

nodes.excerpt: YiChi is a language learning app that helps you perfect speaking Chinese Mandarin. Listen to the right pronunciation and tones, record your version, get instant accurate feedback with our AI based voice evaluation and keep practicing till you get it right.
nodes.title: YiChi - Learn to speak fluent Chinese Mandarin
nodes.author: Yiyi Song

nodes.excerpt: We tidied our nest, spiffed up our feathers and updated our algorithms! Toucan can now help you learn a new language on Safari, Chrome and Edge. â € Spanish, French, Japanese, German, Korean, Portuguese, Italian, Arabic, Mandarin, Hebrew, Hindi, English
nodes.title: Toucan 2.0 - Learn a new language without even trying
nodes.author: Taylor Nieman

nodes.excerpt: Marq is a Nextgen e-learning app that allows you to acquire a new language in a context by using 4 complex features: - daily short lessons, - vocabulary trainer, - smart push notifications - 15 minute speaking sessions with a teacher.
nodes.title: Marq - Nextgen language e-learning application
nodes.author: Oleg Illarionov

nodes.excerpt: BoldVoice is an accent coaching app for non-native English speakers that helps them be as well-understood and confident in English as in their own language. You get personalized daily video lessons by a Hollywood coach and immediate pronunciation feedback.
nodes.title: BoldVoice - Accent coaching app for non-native English speakers
nodes.author: Kat Manalac

nodes.excerpt: Laoshi helps to learn Chinese words and characters. Choose your favorite textbook, subject list, HSK. Use spaced repetition system to remember words for long. Practice drawing Chinese characters directly onto your smartphone at your convenience.
nodes.title: Laoshi - Learn new words with flashcards to master Chinese faster
nodes.author: Daniel

nodes.excerpt: Learn a new language with Chatterbug Streams, the first app for learning Spanish, French and German through interactive live streams. Watch Peloton-like live streams tailored to your level with real-time quizzes and polls.
nodes.title: Chatterbug Streams - Learn a new language with live streamed classes
nodes.author: Scott Chacon

nodes.excerpt: At the beginning of 2021, I started re-writing the curriculum of learnjavascript.online and I'm happy to announce that it's now live! ğŸ‘‰ 75 chapters of modern JavaScript ğŸ‘‰ Learn step by step with flashcards ğŸ‘‰ Interact with real APIs ğŸ‘‰ Lots of DOM + Fetch projects

nodes.excerpt: leerly teaches Spanish with compelling, comprehensible input. Popular articles from the web are summarized and translated to beginner Spanish, which users then enjoy using a suite of built-in tools to make the reading experience fun and effective.
nodes.title: leerly - Learn Spanish with compelling, comprehensible input
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Harken is a smart flashcard app that uses spaced repetition to make remembering easy. You can easily create cards with our flexible WYSIWYG editorâ€”it supports rich text, code blocks, images, and more. Learn more in less time with Harken.
nodes.title: Harken - Flashcard app using smart repetition to improve your memory
nodes.author: Katherine Liu

nodes.excerpt: Traditional dictionaries help you search words, but fail to make you retain them. â € Lockcard is designed so that for every word you search, you are tested on how well you remember them over time, via quiz notifications. Download Lockcard now, it's free!
nodes.title: Lockcard - a new Dictionary - Form a habit of retaining new words
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: NAMA is a messaging app that turns everyday texting into a language practicing tool. Invite a friend and start chatting in any of our 100 languages or enter the practice mode to study the words and phrases from your conversations.
nodes.title: NAMA Chat - Practice any language while texting your friends
nodes.author: Sefunmi Osinaike

nodes.excerpt: Fluent helps you learn French, Spanish, and Italian (soon) while you browse the web. Pick up new words while you read techcrunch, shitpost on twitter, or chat with buddies on messenger. Fluent makes learning every day addicting. Add Fluent to Chrome for free
nodes.title: Fluent 1.0 - Learn a new language while you live your life
nodes.author: Hiten Shah

nodes.excerpt: Nativeway has an only one specific purpose. It's encouraging the language learner to make a speaking from the first learning day.
nodes.title: Nativeway - Practice pronunciation with AI and other people
nodes.author: Fredric Cliver

nodes.excerpt: Language learning is hard... so we made it soft. It's time to turn your bathroom into a classroom with our latest innovation: toilet paper that teaches you phrases in new languages! Never miss a lesson again, because nature is the best push notification.
nodes.title: Duolingo Roll - Turn your bathroom into a classroom
nodes.author: Jack Morgan

nodes.excerpt: Scientists at Toucan have been working diligently with leading researchers at BARK and are ready to unveil their groundbreaking achievement. Our furry friends have been our closest companions and now you can let them know - in their language.
nodes.title: Dog Language Translator by Toucan & BARK - Talk to your furry friend, just like youâ€™ve always wanted
nodes.author: Taylor Nieman

nodes.excerpt: The world is filled with too much noise around China. Meho (â€œvery goodâ€ in Shanghainese) is here to help you contextualize China and equip you with hands-on Chinese skills, so you wonâ€™t miss out on the opportunities brought by the development of China.
nodes.title: Meho - Understand and communicate with China like never before!
nodes.author: Charlie Liu

nodes.excerpt: Mochi = Spaced repetition + Zettelkasten + Markdown
nodes.title: Mochi mobile - Take notes in markdown, study them with spaced repetition
nodes.author: Matt Steedman

nodes.excerpt: A web app that uses spaced repetition, a sophisticated learning algorithm, and a tree-structured note-taking tool. Think Workflowy and Anki combined. It also brings together various learning theories and tricks.
nodes.title: LearnObit - A cognitive tool to boost learning
nodes.author: Sungho Yahng

nodes.excerpt: ProApp is a place to learn all things Design. It's your Digital Design College to learn various Design disciplines with bite-sized content on the go. We launched with 30+ courses - UI/UX design, HCI, Mobile & Web Design, Typography, Microcopy, & many more.
nodes.title: ProApp Learn Design - Learn the foundations of design principles
nodes.author: Sandesh Subedi

nodes.excerpt: Make your videos accessible to a global audience by automatically translating your video online. Expand your reach by creating content in multiple languages, to be viewed by people from all over the globe.
nodes.title: Translate Video - Auto translate your video into different languages online
nodes.author: Ben Lang

nodes.excerpt: Translate words straight from your Alfred launcher: - Open Alfred - Type a language combination and a word: `fren fromage` - Press enter to open the results page on WordReference! Get access to 48 dictionaries across 18 different languages!
nodes.title: WordReference for Alfred - Multilingual translations at your fingertips!
nodes.author: Alex Martin

nodes.excerpt: WellSpeak is a mobile app that helps you to become confident in your English speaking skills. AI and smart algorithms will help you with pronunciation and show how easy it is to speak like a native ğŸ˜"
nodes.title: WellSpeak - Practice your English to speak fluently, easily, confidently
nodes.author: Pavlo Pedenko

nodes.excerpt: Three.js Journey is the ultimate course if you want to learn Three.js and create stunning 3D websites with WebGL. Let Bruno Simon guide you through more than 30 lessons covering basics and advanced usage of the library.
nodes.title: Three.js Journey - The best course to learn how to create stunning 3D websites
nodes.author: Bruno Simon

nodes.excerpt: Imitate lets you practice pronunciation with real-life videos from youtube, and lets you listen to your own recordings to have an instant feedback loop.
nodes.title: Imitate - Learn French pronunciation with real-life videos
nodes.author: Lars Karbo

nodes.excerpt: Finally, a flashcard app that just worksâ€”for iOS and macOS. Thoughtfully designed, Fresh Cards is a joy to use. Using a swipe interface, card review is quick and best of all, cards are auto-scheduled for review again based on how well you did.
nodes.title: Fresh Cards - Flashcards that just work
nodes.author: Allen Ussher
